name: Tu pan a juicio
description:
*This game was made for Tu Juego a Juicio Jam 2021*

You apply for a job offer from the great baker Malva Ajo ... But, oh my god ... Your rival is the great NeyHau, known for his perfect size bread. Your only chance to win is by cheating, sabotaging NeyHau, and making his bread too long.

To do so, repeatedly click the left mouse click, and do not let Malva Ajo catch you cheating by pressing the correct key on time!
